name: Dracard Oransinius Rynell
bio: Son of a noble house, Dracard was taught oratory, diplomacy, music, and fencing as part of his classical education. However, the House Rynell fell into disarray due to poor management and infighting among family members. Dracard left to support himself on musical performances. Now the house has completely collapsed, and Dracard finds himself the last heir to the fallen House Rynell.

name: Icentress Green
bio: Daughter of a kind elven woman and a human con-man, Icentress learned to fend for herself and survive in the woods as she grew up constantly on the run with her father. Her father has died, but rumors are he pulled the biggest con of his life on a clan of Chelaxians before he passed. Now the Chelaxians suspect Icentress of possessing some of their stolen property.

name: Qola
bio: Left on the doorstep of a temple to Calistra as an infant, Qola was taken in by the priestesses and given a full education and kind upbringing. Trained as a sacred prostitute of Calistra, Qola became restless and wonderd about her orcish heritage. She left the temple, and now seeks battle to understand for herself what it means to be orc.
